Text:
Thanks for sharing.

I hope the EZTV website is back soon though.  Nicer to navigate than here.
sometimes i wish i wasn't hung like a goddamned horse..

For some reason I can't get the audio to play for this video on my new mac.  I tried tv rips of mighty boosh and they wouldn't play either, but the dvdrip season 1 and .mov season 3 did.  I got the xvid codec for quicktime and that gave me picture, then I got the divx codec, but that didn't do anything.  Anyone knoe what's wrong?
Correction. I can't get audio in ANY .avi file.

clitsy1

Try updating to Perian 1.1.4, plus the newest version of QuickTime, or if nothing else, use VLC player in the meantime. I'm on a Mac too, and had to use a combination of fixes in the past. Still worth it though!  ;)
Anytime! Glad it worked, and that I could help! ;)
